            "title": [
              [
                "def divide(x, y)\n  begin\n    z = x/y\n    return z\n  rescue ZeroDivisionError\n    puts \"Don't divide by zero!\"\n  rescue TypeError\n    puts \"Division only works on numbers!\"\n    return nil\n  rescue => e\n    puts \"Don't do that (%s)\" % [e.class]\n    return nil\n  ensure\n    puts \"This code ALWAYS runs.\"\n  end\nend"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

              [" clause, the "],

              [" clause "],
              ["is executed", [["i"]]],
              [" before the "],
              ["begin", [["c"]]],
              [" or "],
              ["rescue", [["c"]]],
              [" clause returns a value. If the "],
